[[inst_hl_lh_pr]]
==== HL.LH.PR

*Syntax:* hl.lh.pr [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lh_pr.svg[HL.LH.PR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PRE_INDEX
